data.title: Games Global launches several games to start August
data.meta_description: Casino game supplier Games Global has announced its intentions to launch several games this month, with 9 Pots of Gold Land & Win and Candy Combo - Power Combo already live.These games haven’t been made specifically for the U.S. market like some of Games Global’s recent launches, such as
data.text:
Casino game supplier Games Global has announced its intentions to launch several games this month, with 9 Pots of Gold Land & Win and Candy Combo – Power Combo already live.

These games haven’t been made specifically for the U.S. market like some of Games Global’s recent launches, such as Iron Eagle Power Combo. Many of Games Global’s new titles are expected to be available through the company’s U.S. partner online casinos.

Games Global will debut Break Da Bank Again Mega Moolah 4Tune Reels on Wednesday. This game combines the popular Mega Moolah progressive jackpot feature with the Break Da Bank series setting, with several Break Da Bank titles available at U.S. online casinos.

Stars Bonanza from Nailed It! Games will be released on Thursday.

Additional third-party games will be released through Games Global PLUS. Giant King from Oryx and Beach Club from RFranco are live now, while Hacksaw Gaming’s Limbo will go live on Thursday and Hölle Gaming’s Book of Bonanza is set to launch on Friday.
